p: In addition, a study conducted by Menichini et al. showed that the most antiproliferative oils were those from T. polium ssp. capitatum and T. montbretii ssp. heliotropiifolium on CACO-2 cell lines (IC 50 = 52.7 and 92.2 μg/ml, respectively). The T. brevifolium EO showed a selective cytotoxicity on COR-L23, while significant activity was exerted by T. polium oil on C32 [ 30].
